name: CLOCK®
description: CLOCK® is a new, patent-pending, cutting-edge nootropic product that may help improve the benefits of sleep and optimize wakeful hours. Feel more energetic, productive, mentally alert, and balanced with CLOCK® since it helps to increase BDNF, irisin, choline, and acetylcholine (Ach) levels. In addition, it increases melatonin, which is considered the sleep hormone to help improve the benefits of quality sleep.
